cleaner-menus.tooltip.addInGameMenuBlur:
Adds the vanilla blur effect to the background of in-game menus. The intensity of the blur can be set via the vanilla accessibility settings.

Default: ON
cleaner-menus.tooltip.disableInGameMenuD:
Disables the darkening of the background of in-game menus.

Default: ON
cleaner-menus.tooltip.disableMainMenuDar:
Disables the darkening of the background of game menus, such as the pause menu.

Default: OFF
